query:
SELECT c.nome, f.codigo, f.dataFesta, f.tema 
FROM festas f 
JOIN clientes c ON f.clienteId = c.id 
WHERE c.nome LIKE '%Rodrigo%' OR c.nome LIKE '%Rios%'
LIMIT 5
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 48JvJ4xGnzv6z7Y.root --database kipPpydFSSmPdFAif48Epo --execute SELECT c.nome, f.codigo, f.dataFesta, f.tema 
FROM festas f 
JOIN clientes c ON f.clienteId = c.id 
WHERE c.nome LIKE '%Rodrigo%' OR c.nome LIKE '%Rios%'
LIMIT 5
